name: SpearBlade(2021 GMTK Game Jam Submission
description:
SpearBlade is a zombie hack-and-slash game made in 48 hours for the Game Maker's Tool Kit Game Jam. 

You are a lone survivor in your village. Armed with a spear, you must fight off zombies to survive. The catch? The King of the Zombies, the King Zombie, has implanted his tongue into your skull, linking you both together and limiting your movement. To make his grasp weaker,  you must kill zombies and pick up their hearts, which contain blood. Be quick-the longer the zombie has been alive, the less blood their heart has. Killing zombies also gives money, which can be used to buy upgrades in the pause menu. 

This was a blast to make and I would totally do it again! Obviously there are bugs, let me know if you find any in the comments.

Thanks for playing!

-A
